Articles.Content:
Does anyone know if there are any plans to incorporate parts welding into the core game or if there is anyone currently updating the old parts welder add on.

I tend to end up going overboard on my parts count and absolutely butchering my FPS into unplayability. I have had a large and complex station in orbit at one point but there was no way to dock with it as my frame rate dropped into the seconds per frame range when attempting to dock with even the most meager craft.

I would love to see the capacity to build very large and complex structure but as I have no real programming knowledge, writing the code myself is beyond my ability.

\*facepalms\* we have a mod swimming somewhere....

Here is da link [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107273-0-90-UbioZur-Welding-Ltd-Continued-2-1-1-(2015-01-14)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107273-0-90-UbioZur-Welding-Ltd-Continued-2-1-1-%282015-01-14%29)

Github version has 1.0

Thank you for the response. I will try to be patient and wait for a compatible version.

I would think such a critical bit of programming would have been included in the base game, but then my programming ability ended with the extinction of the BASIC language. Yes....I am an old fart.

> 
> Thank you for the response. I will try to be patient and wait for a compatible version.
> I would think such a critical bit of programming would have been included in the base game, but then my programming ability ended with the extinction of the BASIC language. Yes....I am an old fart.

Take up a challenge :

Learnhow to code in ksp ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

1.0 is in the github download!
